tag_list: techiecrunch, technology, consultant, software, hardware, internet, web-designer, illustrator
overview:
Daksh authors the popular TechieCrunch blog where he writes about computer software, consumer gadgets, tech-related problems and web applications.

He is a 15 year old student and the founder of TechieCrunch, a one-stop source of tech stuff. A technology consultant for friends, he made TechieCrunch to show his skills to the world.

He is also a freelance illustrator, web designer and motion graphics expert. He has been researching and blogÂ­ging for about 2 years now, with TechieCrunch being the project he is most proud of and have stayed with throughÂ­out his entire career as a blogger.
